title: Quick New Supermoon Trailer for 'Werewolves' Action Horror Movie
description: "Whatever you do, stay out of the moonlight." In honor of tonight's supermoon visible in the US, Briarcliff has revealed a new trailer for the upcoming Werewovles action horror movie. Which opens on December 6th in just a few weeks. Tonight is the final 2024 supermoon called the "Full Beaver Moon" and if you know any lycanthropes in your neighborhood, you might want to stay indoors (though do take a peek at the moon at some point). One year ago, a Supermoon turned millions into werewolves. This December, it’s happening again. Two scientists try to stop a mutation that turns people into werewolves after a supermoon the year before. This is going to be totally gnarly! A must watch for horror fans! Werewolves features Frank Grillo, Katrina Law, Ilfenesh Hadera, James Michael Cummings, Lou Diamond Phillips. With practical werewolves designed & built by Alec Gillis and Tom Woodruff Jr (known for Alien and Predator FX). The full trailer has better footage but this is a good reminder not to skip this when it opens in theaters soon. Here's the supermoon promo trailer for Steven C. Miller's horror Werewolves, direct from YouTube: You can view the full official trailer for Steven […]
author: Alex Billington

text: TRAILERS by November 15, 2024Source: YouTube "Whatever you do, stay out of the moonlight." In honor of tonight's supermoon visible in the US, Briarcliff has revealed a new trailer for the upcoming Werewovles action horror movie. Which opens on December 6th in just a few weeks. Tonight is the final 2024 supermoon called the "Full Beaver Moon" and if you know any lycanthropes in your neighborhood, you might want to stay indoors (though do take a peek at the moon at some point). One year ago, a Supermoon turned millions into werewolves. This December, it’s happening again. Two scientists try to stop a mutation that turns people into werewolves after a supermoon the year before. This is going to be totally gnarly! A must watch for horror fans! Werewolves features Frank Grillo, Katrina Law, Ilfenesh Hadera, James Michael Cummings, Lou Diamond Phillips. With practical werewolves designed & built by Alec Gillis and Tom Woodruff Jr (known for Alien and Predator FX). The full trailer has better footage but this is a good reminder not to skip this when it opens in theaters soon. Here's the supermoon promo trailer for Steven C. Miller's horror Werewolves, direct from YouTube: You can view the full official trailer for Steven C. Miller's Werewolves movie right here for more footage. In Werewolves, a supermoon event triggers a latent gene in every human on the planet, turning anyone who entered the moonlight into a werewolf for that one night. Chaos ensued and close to a billion people died. Now, a year later, the Supermoon is back. Werewolves is directed by the American action filmmaker Steven C. Miller, of the movies The Aggression Scale, Silent Night, Submerged, Extraction, Marauders, Arsenal, First Kill, Escape Plan 2: Hades, Line of Duty, and Margaux previously. The screenplay is written by Matthew Kennedy (also of Inheritance, Canary Black). It's produced by Jim Cardwell, Craig Chapman, Sevier Crespo, James Michael Cummings, Myles Nestel, & Steven C. Miller. Briarcliff Ent. will debut Miller's Werewolves movies in theaters nationwide starting December 6th, 2024 later this year. Who's into this? Find more posts: Horror, To Watch, Trailer prev next
html:
TRAILERS

by
November 15, 2024
Source: YouTube

"Whatever you do, stay out of the moonlight." In honor of tonight's supermoon visible in the US, Briarcliff has revealed a new trailer for the upcoming Werewovles action horror movie. Which opens on December 6th in just a few weeks. Tonight is the final 2024 supermoon called the "Full Beaver Moon" and if you know any lycanthropes in your neighborhood, you might want to stay indoors (though do take a peek at the moon at some point). One year ago, a Supermoon turned millions into werewolves. This December, it’s happening again. Two scientists try to stop a mutation that turns people into werewolves after a supermoon the year before. This is going to be totally gnarly! A must watch for horror fans! Werewolves features Frank Grillo, Katrina Law, Ilfenesh Hadera, James Michael Cummings, Lou Diamond Phillips. With practical werewolves designed & built by Alec Gillis and Tom Woodruff Jr (known for Alien and Predator FX). The full trailer has better footage but this is a good reminder not to skip this when it opens in theaters soon.

Here's the supermoon promo trailer for Steven C. Miller's horror Werewolves, direct from YouTube:

You can view the full official trailer for Steven C. Miller's Werewolves movie right here for more footage.

In Werewolves, a supermoon event triggers a latent gene in every human on the planet, turning anyone who entered the moonlight into a werewolf for that one night. Chaos ensued and close to a billion people died. Now, a year later, the Supermoon is back. Werewolves is directed by the American action filmmaker Steven C. Miller, of the movies The Aggression Scale, Silent Night, Submerged, Extraction, Marauders, Arsenal, First Kill, Escape Plan 2: Hades, Line of Duty, and Margaux previously. The screenplay is written by Matthew Kennedy (also of Inheritance, Canary Black). It's produced by Jim Cardwell, Craig Chapman, Sevier Crespo, James Michael Cummings, Myles Nestel, & Steven C. Miller. Briarcliff Ent. will debut Miller's Werewolves movies in theaters nationwide starting December 6th, 2024 later this year. Who's into this?

Find more posts: Horror, To Watch, Trailer
